rpg.v4.client.gui.util.picker
Interface Picker

All Known Implementing Classes:
IntegerPicker, StringPicker
public interface Picker

Created by IntelliJ IDEA. User: Sven-Ivar Fjeld Date: 18.sep.2005 Time: 14:17:55

A picker is an object that allows a user to pick a value in a set of possible choices. This can be numbers, colors, entities, etc. It then notifies the registered rpg.server.action.Action what happened and with the new value.

This sets the value of the picker, displayed to the user but does not propagate it to the action

Could have casted a picker to a JLabel but then we could never create a picker that extends a different class.

Parameters:
obj -

setPickedValue

void setPickedValue(java.lang.Object obj)
When this is called then the picker sets its own picked value to something AND notifies its encapsulated action of what has changed. When the action updates it sends an update to its observers, among them an ActionPanel. The ActionPanel with tell the picker to update itself, and need to do this as the picker could potentially be changed by other factors. When this happens, the picker value is set quietly instead.

Parameters:
obj -
